channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Charm by Samsung
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Charm by Samsung

item.title: CVE-2022-33734|2024-08-03T08:09:22.808Z -- samsung%20mobile -- charm%20by%20samsung
item.description: Sensitive information exposure in onCharacteristicChanged in Charm by Samsung prior to version 1.2.3 allows attacker to get bluetooth connection information without permission.

item.title: CVE-2022-33733|2024-08-03T08:09:22.635Z -- samsung%20mobile -- charm%20by%20samsung
item.description: Sensitive information exposure in onCharacteristicRead in Charm by Samsung prior to version 1.2.3 allows attacker to get bluetooth connection information without permission.
